reviewText: Great movie from when I was a kid. Finally found it on DVD.

Subtle humor with interesting plot.
This is a hard to find flick (not on Netflix)
Character development, romance (clean), mobsters (minimal violence), suspense,  chase scenes, and a happy ending.
Its got it all.
This is a great little known comedy starring Carol Kane and Judge Reinhold escaping from the Mob. It's a must see!!
